DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety T-614 versus placebo add ongoing , stable-dose methotrexate therapy patient persistently active rheumatoid arthritis
DOC.brief_title: A Multicenter , Randomized , Double-blind , Placebo-controlled Study Combination Therapy T-614 Methotrexate Rheumatoid Arthritis Patients With Inadequate Response Methotrexate
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Subjects diagnosis Rheumatoid Arthritis ACR criterion Age great 20 year less 70 year old Exclusion criterion : Subject consider investigator , reason , unsuitable candidate study Women childbearing potential practicing successful method contraception , wish become pregnant
